A Song<S>7892</S> and Psalm<S>4210</S> for the sons<S>1121</S> of Korah<S>7141</S>. Great<S>1419</S> is the LORD<S>3068</S>, and greatly<S>3966</S> to be praised<S>1984</S> in the city<S>5892</S> of our God<S>430</S>, in the mountain<S>2022</S> of his holiness<S>6944</S>. <sup>for: or, of</sup>
Beautiful<S>3303</S> for situation<S>5131</S>, the joy<S>4885</S> of the whole earth<S>776</S>, is mount<S>2022</S> Zion<S>6726</S>, on the sides<S>3411</S> of the north<S>6828</S>, the city<S>7151</S> of the great<S>7227</S> King<S>4428</S>.
God<S>430</S> is known<S>3045</S> in her palaces<S>759</S> for a refuge<S>4869</S>.
For, lo, the kings<S>4428</S> were assembled<S>3259</S>, they passed by<S>5674</S> together<S>3162</S>.
They saw<S>7200</S> it, and so they marvelled<S>8539</S>; they were troubled<S>926</S>, and hasted away<S>2648</S>.
Fear<S>7461</S> took hold<S>270</S> upon them there, and pain<S>2427</S>, as of a woman in travail<S>3205</S>.
Thou breakest<S>7665</S> the ships<S>591</S> of Tarshish<S>8659</S> with an east<S>6921</S> wind<S>7307</S>.
As we have heard<S>8085</S>, so have we seen<S>7200</S> in the city<S>5892</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>, in the city<S>5892</S> of our God<S>430</S>: God<S>430</S> will establish<S>3559</S> it for<S>5704</S> ever<S>5769</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
We have thought<S>1819</S> of thy lovingkindness<S>2617</S>, O God<S>430</S>, in the midst<S>7130</S> of thy temple<S>1964</S>.
According to thy name<S>8034</S>, O God<S>430</S>, so is thy praise<S>8416</S> unto the ends<S>7099</S> of the earth<S>776</S>: thy right hand<S>3225</S> is full<S>4390</S> of righteousness<S>6664</S>.
Let mount<S>2022</S> Zion<S>6726</S> rejoice<S>8055</S>, let the daughters<S>1323</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> be glad<S>1523</S>, because of thy judgments<S>4941</S>.
Walk about<S>5437</S> Zion<S>6726</S>, and go round about<S>5362</S> her: tell<S>5608</S> the towers<S>4026</S> thereof.
Mark<S>7896</S> ye well<S>3820</S> her bulwarks<S>2430</S>, consider<S>6448</S> her palaces<S>759</S>; that ye may tell<S>5608</S> it to the generation<S>1755</S> following<S>314</S>. <sup>Mark: Heb. Set your heart to</sup> <sup>consider: or, raise up</sup>
For this God<S>430</S> is our God<S>430</S> for ever<S>5769</S> and ever<S>5703</S>: he will be our guide<S>5090</S> even unto death<S>4192</S>.
